name: Dash Master
description:
In Dash Master you and up to 3 friends throw each other out until only one remains in solid ground.

The Orbnoids, are a charismatic spheric robot race, that from time to time hold a tournament for the Gold Orbnoid, the great trophy that represents the best among best, the hero of a nation.

Now a new tournament begins, the nations already choose their champions for the great tournament, but only one can be the winner, who of you will be the Gold Orbnoid.
